document.full_text: russian and nato forces conducted joint counter-terrorism exercises tuesday aimed at preparing for the type of hijacked aircraft attack that destroyed new york's world trade center towers on september 11, 2001.
document.title: nato-russia drill aims to prevent september 11 attack
lines_and_colors: russian and nato forces conducted joint counter-terrorism exercises tuesday aimed at preparing for the type of hijacked aircraft attack that destroyed new york's world trade center towers on september 11, 2001.
